#Groceries Tender Announcement
---
##Tender Information
	subtitle: Reference to Government Tender Announcement
 para: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites interested suppliers to submit a bid for the Regional Individual Standing Offers (RMSO) for the supply and delivery of dairy and egg products, miscellaneous groceries, fresh produce, and protein on an as-needed basis.

##General Information
	subtitle: Tender Details
 para: Tender Number: PW-STN-201-5579
 title: Solicitation Number
 para: W0142-23X010/A

 subtitle: Contact Information
 para: Marsland, Rina

 para: Departments of Public Works and Government Services Canada, Worthington Building, 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5

##Description of Requirements
* title: Goods or Services Description
 National Defence, Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Suffield, has a requirement for RIFSO for the supply and delivery of the following commodities on an as and when requested basis:
	- Dairy and Eggs
	- Miscellaneous Groceries
	- Fresh Produce
	- Protein
* title: Commodity Nature
	- RFSO for each commodity can result in the issuance of up to two (2) Standing Offers per commodity.
	- The periods of the Standing Offers will be for four, six-month periods with applicable refresh and rebid periods.

##Evaluation Criteria
* title: Evaluation Method
	- Lowest/Lower Bid

##Submission Information
* title: Documents Requirements
	- Suppliers can submit documents in either English or French.

##Expiry Date
 subtitle: Tender Closing Date
 para: 2022-09-14T15:00:00
 subtitle: Tender Status
 para: Expired
